Package etomica.atom

Class AtomType

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.atom.AtomType
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AtomTypeOriented, AtomTypeSpheroPolyhedron

    public class AtomType
extends java.lang.Object
    Identifies a set of atoms and defines properties of those atoms. Properties include indices used for tracking, mass and element.

    • Method Detail

      • simple

        public static AtomType simple​(java.lang.String symbol,
                              double mass)
        Convenience factory method for creating an AtomType with a one-off ElementSimple.
        Parameters:
        symbol - symbol for the element of this AtomType
        mass - mass for the element of this AtomType
        Returns:
        an AtomType with an ElementSimple

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex​()
        Returns:
        the index for this IAtomType, within the context of an Simulation. The index is the IAtomType's position in the list of atom types in the simulation.

      • setIndex

        public void setIndex​(int newIndex)
        Informs the IAtomType what its index should be. This should only be called by the species.
        Parameters:
        newIndex - the atom type's new index

      • getSpecies

        public ISpecies getSpecies​()
        Returns:
        the species that contains the atom type

      • setSpecies

        public void setSpecies​(ISpecies newSpecies)
        Informs the atom type what species contains the atom types. This should only be called by the species.
        Parameters:
        newSpecies - the atom type's new species

      • getMass

        public final double getMass​()
        Returns:
        the value of the mass.

      • rm

        public final double rm​()
        Returns:
        the reciprocal of the mass, 1.0/mass

      • getMassDimension

        public final Dimension getMassDimension​()

      • getElement

        public final IElement getElement​()
        Returns:
        the element for this atom type
